ch0108_40_nobori/0101_0701_01_10:
Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. What can I do
for you today?
ch0108_40_nobori/0101_0701_02_10:
If I can be of service in any way, please let me
know! I will come to your aid faster than an
express train!
ch0108_40_nobori/7101_0701_01_10:
This outfit feels different from my Battle Subway
uniform. I feel competent and put together!
ch0108_40_nobori/7101_0701_02_10:
I feel like I could complete any task to perfection
wearing this!
ch0108_40_nobori/7101_0701_03_10:
In the meantime... May I offer you something
to drink?
ch0108_40_nobori/7102_0701_01_10:
How I care for others here sometimes overlaps
with manners I learned while working on
the Battle Subway.
ch0108_40_nobori/7102_0701_02_10:
For example, when entering and leaving a room,
I do the same bow as when I enter or leave
a subway car!
ch0108_40_nobori/7102_0701_03_10:
This is just further proof that the events in your life
are all interconnected. Just like a railroad track!
ch0108_40_nobori/7103_0701_01_10:
Did you know? Movies and comics that star
Accelgor always sell well.
ch0108_40_nobori/7103_0701_02_10:
The secret is in Accelgor’s quick movements—how
they swoop out of nowhere to save you
from danger!
ch0108_40_nobori/7104_0701_01_10:
My younger brother, Emmet, would always
entertain passengers on the Battle Subway...
ch0108_40_nobori/7104_0701_02_10: Now he is enjoying being a host here on Pasio.
ch0108_40_nobori/7104_0701_03_10:
However, he’s still new to this style of hospitality.
Would you mind keeping an eye on him?
ch0108_40_nobori/7105_0701_02_10:
There may be no railways on Pasio, but it is still
my job to get passengers safely to
their destination!
ch0108_40_nobori/7105_0701_03_10: Let us go together! All aboard!
ch0108_40_nobori/1701_0701_01_10: Bravo! I want you to have this!
ch0108_40_nobori/1701_0702_01_10: I hope you will find it useful!
ch0108_40_nobori/2501_0701_01_10: I’ve realized that it is my nature to support others.
ch0108_40_nobori/2501_0701_02_10:
It’s all thanks to Darach. Meeting him has taught
me so much about being a butler.
ch0108_40_nobori/2501_0702_01_10:
In the future, if I ever reach my last stop as a
Subway Boss...
ch0108_40_nobori/2501_0702_02_10:
perhaps I could have you employ me as
your butler.
ch0108_40_nobori/2511_0701_01_10:
When working for somebody, I believe it is
important to establish trust with that person.
ch0108_40_nobori/2511_0701_02_10:
To do that, you must be strong enough to protect
those around you in an emergency.
ch0108_40_nobori/2511_0702_01_10:
Pokémon battles are the perfect way to build both
trust and strength.
ch0108_40_nobori/2511_0702_02_10:
Therefore, prepare for a Pokémon battle
against me!
ch0108_40_nobori/3001_0701_01_10:
Are you heading out for the day? I wish I had
your energy this early in the morning. I’d better
train harder, or you’ll pass me right up.
ch0108_40_nobori/3003_0701_01_10:
Following the railroad track is always good, but
changing over to a new track has its own
merits, too!
ch0108_40_nobori/3005_0701_01_10:
You aren’t going to miss the last train, are you?
Please, make sure you get home safe!
